title: Given MPC and spending change, calc change in RGDP

content.prompt: In a closed economy with only lump-sum taxation, if the marginal propensity to consume is equal to 0.75, a $70 billion increase in government spending could cause a maximum increase in output of

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
